name: 002 Chilli Con Carne
instructions: Dice Onion and brown over medium heat.
Add 1 tsp chilli powder, 1 tsp cumin, 1tsp cinnamon, beef mince and brown.
Add diced tomatoes, tomato puree, 1 tbsp oregano, and 1 beef stock cube (crumbled) - mix.
Add a little bit of hot water, mix, bring to simmer (reduce  heat slightly).
Simmer with lid on for 20min. Stirring every ~5min.
On the side, cook rice and leave to sit.
Add drained and washed kidney beans to chilli mixture, stir, leave lid off for 10 minutes. Stirring every ~5min.
Stir again, leave to rest for ~15min. Serve.
notes: Also goes well with mashed/jacket potato.
Gluten Free (!) -> Ensure stock cube has no gluten.
